amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 119-232 to prohibit funds made available by this Act from being used to close campgrounds operated by the Army Corps of Engineers that are located at Lake Sidney Lanier, Georgia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
